name: gajah-nusa-erp
description: GAJAH NUSA ERP System - Desktop, Mobile, and ML Integration

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:mobile
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../mobile && npm install
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:db: cd backend && python -m alembic upgrade head
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && python -m black . && python -m isort .
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:mobile && npm run clean:backend
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + || true

author: GAJAH NUSA Team
